downloadTitle: Setup Guide: Server-side synchronization for CRM Online and Exchange Server
downloadDescription: Learn how to set up the server-side synchronization connection between Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online and Microsoft Exchange email servers.

downloadFile.name: Setup Guide Server-side synchronization for CRM Online and Exchange Server.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/d/0/ed05ca70-190f-4bae-9f6a-0bb2f0010b81/Setup Guide Server-side synchronization for CRM Online and Exchange Server.pdf

detailsSection: Server-side synchronization is a component in Microsoft Dynamics CRM that is used to integrate CRM with Microsoft Exchange email servers. Server-side synchronization is the preferred option for organizations with users who run CRM in a web browser or on a mobile device, such as a tablet or smartphone. In CRM Online 2016 Update, we have added a hybrid server-side synchronization capability: the support of CRM Online with Exchange Server (on-premises).
detailsSection_file_name: Setup Guide Server-side synchronization for CRM Online and Exchange Server.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: For docx files, Microsoft Office Word 2003 or later versions, or a compatible viewer. For pdf files, an Adobe PDF reader is required.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.
  2. To copy the file to your computer, click Save to save this file to disk.
  3. To extract the document, double-click the compressed file.
